original: Majjhima Nikāya 107
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Gaṇakamoggallānasutta
analyzed: gaṇaka moggallāna sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati pubbārāme migāra mātu pāsāde

original: Atha kho gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha khalu gaṇakamoggallānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho gaṇakamoggallānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, imassa migāramātupāsādassa dissati anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: seyyathā api bho gotama imassa migāra mātu pāsādassa dissati anupubba sikkhā anupubba kiriyā anupubba paṭipadā yat idam

original: yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarā;
analyzed: yāva pacchima sopāna kaḷevarā

original: imesampi hi, bho gotama, brāhmaṇānaṁ dissati anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: imesam pi hi bho gotama brāhmaṇānam dissati anupubba sikkhā anupubba kiriyā anupubba paṭipadā yat idam

original: ajjhene;
analyzed: ajjhene

original: imesampi hi, bho gotama, issāsānaṁ dissati anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: imesam pi hi bho gotama issāsānam dissati anupubba sikkhā anupubba kiriyā anupubba paṭipadā yat idam

original: issatthe.
analyzed: is s atthe

original: Amhākampi hi, bho gotama, gaṇakānaṁ gaṇanājīvānaṁ dissati anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: amhākam pi hi bho gotama gaṇakānam gaṇanājīvānam dissati anupubba sikkhā anupubba kiriyā anupubba paṭipadā yat idam

original: saṅkhāne.
analyzed: saṅkhāne

original: Mayañhi, bho gotama, antevāsiṁ labhitvā paṭhamaṁ evaṁ gaṇāpema:
analyzed: mayan hi bho gotama antevāsim labhitvā paṭhamam evam

original: ‘ekaṁ ekakaṁ, dve dukā, tīṇi tikā, cattāri catukkā, pañca pañcakā, cha chakkā, satta sattakā, aṭṭha aṭṭhakā, nava navakā, dasa dasakā’ti;
analyzed: ekaṃ ekaka dve dukā tīṇi tikā cattāri catukkā pañca pañcakā cha chakkā satta sattakā aṭṭha aṭṭhakā nava navakā dasa dasakā ati

original: satampi mayaṁ, bho gotama, gaṇāpema, bhiyyopi gaṇāpema.
analyzed: bhiyyas pi gaṇāpema

original: Sakkā nu kho, bho gotama, imasmimpi dhammavinaye evameva anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā paññapetun”ti?
analyzed: sakkā nu kho bho gotama imasmim pi dhamma vinaye evam eva anupubba sikkhā anupubba kiriyā anupubba paṭipadā paññapetunti

original: “Sakkā, brāhmaṇa, imasmimpi dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā paññapetuṁ.
analyzed: sakkā brāhmaṇaḥ imasmim pi dhamma vinaye anupubba sikkhā anupubba kiriyā anupubba paṭipadā paññapetu

original: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, dakkho assadammako bhaddaṁ assājānīyaṁ labhitvā paṭhameneva mukhādhāne kāraṇaṁ kāreti, atha uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ kāreti;
analyzed: seyyathā api brāhmaṇa dakkhaḥ assa dammakaḥ bhaddam assājānīyam labhitvā paṭhamena iva mukhādhāne kāraṇam kāreti atha uttarim kāraṇam kāreti

original: evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, tathāgato purisadammaṁ labhitvā paṭhamaṁ evaṁ vineti:
analyzed: evam eva kho brāhmaṇa tathāgataḥ purisa dammam labhitvā paṭhamam evam vinā iti

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, sīlavā hohi, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharāhi ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhassu sikkhāpadesū’ti.
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu sīlavā hohi pātimokkha savara savutaḥ viharāhi ācāra gocara sampannaḥ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvī samādāya sikkhassu sikkhāpadesu uti

original: Yato kho, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno
analyzed: yatas kho brāhmaṇa bhikkhu sīlavā hoti pātimokkha savara savutaḥ viharati ācāra gocara sampannaḥ

original: aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu, tamenaṁ tathāgato uttariṁ vineti:
analyzed: aṇu mattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu tam enam tathāgataḥ uttarim vineti

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, indriyesu guttadvāro hohi, cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā mā nimittaggāhī hohi mānubyañjanaggāhī.
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu indriyesu gutta dvāraḥ hohi cakkhunā rūpam disvā mā nimitta ggāhī hohi mā anubyañjana ggāhī

original: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
analyzed: yatvā adhikaraṇam enam cakkhu indriyam asavutam viharantam abhijjhā domanassā pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ

original: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjāhi; rakkhāhi cakkhundriyaṁ, cakkhundriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjāhi.
analyzed: dhammāḥ anvāssaveyyum tassa savarāya paṭipajjāhi rakkhāhi cakkhundriya cakkhundriye savaram āpajjāhi

original: Sotena saddaṁ sutvā …pe…
analyzed: sotena saddam sutvā pe

original: ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyitvā …pe…
analyzed: ghānena gandham ghāyitvā pe

original: jivhāya rasaṁ sāyitvā …pe…
analyzed: jivhāya rasam sāyitvā pe

original: kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusitvā …pe…
analyzed: kāyena phoṭṭhabbam phusitvā pe

original: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya mā nimittaggāhī hohi mānubyañjanaggāhī.
analyzed: manasā dhammam viññāya mā nimitta ggāhī hohi mā anubyañjana ggāhī

original: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
analyzed: yatvā adhikaraṇam enam man indriyam viharantam abhijjhā domanassā pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ

original: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjāhi; rakkhāhi manindriyaṁ, manindriye
analyzed: dhammāḥ anvāssaveyyum tassa savarāya paṭipajjāhi rakkhāhi manindriya manindriye

original: saṁvaraṁ āpajjāhī’ti.
analyzed: savaram āpajjāhi iti

original: Yato kho, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvāro hoti, tamenaṁ tathāgato uttariṁ vineti:
analyzed: yatas kho brāhmaṇa bhikkhu indriyesu gutta dvāraḥ hoti tam enam tathāgataḥ uttarim vineti

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhojane mattaññū hohi.
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu bhojane mattaññū hohi

original: Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṁ āhāreyyāsi—
analyzed: paṭisaṅkhā yonisaḥ āhāram āhāreyyā asi

original: neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā
analyzed: na iva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya yāvat eva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā

original: yāpanāya vihiṁsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya—iti purāṇañca vedanaṁ paṭihaṅkhāmi,
analyzed: yāpanāya brahmacariya anuggahāya eti purāṇam ca vedanam paṭihaṅkhāmi

original: navañca vedanaṁ na uppādessāmi, yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā’ti.
analyzed: navam ca vedanam na uppādessāmi yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajja tā ca phāsu vihāraḥ ca ati

original: Yato kho, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu bhojane mattaññū hoti, tamenaṁ tathāgato uttariṁ vineti:
analyzed: yatas kho brāhmaṇa bhikkhu bhojane mattaññū hoti tam enam tathāgataḥ uttarim vineti

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, jāgariyaṁ anuyutto viharāhi, divasaṁ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu jāgariyam anuyuttaḥ viharāhi divasam caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi

original: dhammehi cittaṁ parisodhehi, rattiyā paṭhamaṁ yāmaṁ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi
analyzed: dhammehi cittam parisodhehi rattiyā paṭhamam yāmam caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi

original: dhammehi cittaṁ parisodhehi, rattiyā majjhimaṁ yāmaṁ dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṁ
analyzed: dhammehi cittam parisodhehi rattiyāḥ majjhimam yāmam dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyya

original: kappeyyāsi pāde pādaṁ accādhāya sato sampajāno uṭṭhānasaññaṁ manasikaritvā, rattiyā
analyzed: kappeyyāsi pāde pādam accādhāya sataḥ sampajānaḥ uṭṭhāna saññam manasikaritvā rattiyā

original: pacchimaṁ yāmaṁ paccuṭṭhāya caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodhehī’ti.
analyzed: pacchimam yāmam paccuṭṭhāya caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittam parisodhehi iti

original: Yato kho, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu jāgariyaṁ anuyutto hoti, tamenaṁ tathāgato uttariṁ vineti:
analyzed: yatas kho brāhmaṇa bhikkhu jāgariyam anuyuttaḥ hoti tam enam tathāgataḥ uttarim vineti

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, satisampajaññena samannāgato hohi, abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī,
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu sati sampajaññena samannāgataḥ hohi abhikkante paṭikkante sampajāna kārī

original: ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī, samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe
analyzed: ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī saṅghāṭi patta cīvara dhāraṇe

original: sampajānakārī, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī, uccārapassāvakamme sampajānakārī,
analyzed: sampajāna kārī asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajāna kārī uccāra passāva kamme sampajāna kārī

original: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī’ti.
analyzed: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajāna kārī iti

original: Yato kho, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhu satisampajaññena samannāgato hoti, tamenaṁ tathāgato uttariṁ vineti:
analyzed: yatas kho brāhmaṇa bhikkhu sati sampajaññena samannāgataḥ hoti tam enam tathāgataḥ uttarim vineti

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajāhi araññaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pabbataṁ kandaraṁ giriguhaṁ susānaṁ vanapatthaṁ abbhokāsaṁ palālapuñjan’ti.
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu vivittam senāsanam bhajāhi araññam rukkha mūlam pabbatam kandaram giri guham su sānam vana pattham abbhokāsam palāla puñjanti

original: So vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajati araññaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pabbataṁ kandaraṁ giriguhaṁ susānaṁ vanapatthaṁ abbhokāsaṁ palālapuñjaṁ.
analyzed: so vivittam senāsanam bhajati araññam rukkha mūlam pabbatam kandaram giri guham su sānam vana pattham abbhokāsam palāla puñja

original: So pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā, ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya, parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
analyzed: saḥ pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ nisīdati pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya parimukham satim upaṭṭhapetvā

original: So abhijjhaṁ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharati, abhijjhāya cittaṁ parisodheti;
analyzed: saḥ abhijjham loke pahāya vigata abhijjhena cetasā viharati abhijjhāya cittam parisodheti

original: byāpādapadosaṁ pahāya abyāpannacitto viharati sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī, byāpādapadosā cittaṁ parisodheti;
analyzed: byāpāda padosam pahāya a byāpanna cittaḥ viharati sabba pāṇa bhūta hita anukampī byāpāda padosā cittam parisodheti

original: thinamiddhaṁ pahāya vigatathinamiddho viharati ālokasaññī sato sampajāno, thinamiddhā cittaṁ parisodheti;
analyzed: thinamiddham pahāya vigata thinamiddhaḥ viharati āloka saññī sataḥ sampajānaḥ thinamiddhā cittam parisodheti

original: uddhaccakukkuccaṁ pahāya anuddhato viharati ajjhattaṁ vūpasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccā cittaṁ parisodheti;
analyzed: uddhacca kukkuccam pahāya anuddhataḥ viharati ajjhattam vūpasanta cittaḥ uddhacca kukkuccā cittam parisodheti

original: vicikicchaṁ pahāya tiṇṇavicikiccho viharati akathaṅkathī kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchāya cittaṁ parisodheti.
analyzed: vicikiccham pahāya tiṇṇa vicikicchaḥ viharati a kathaṅkathī kusalesu dhammesu vicikicchāya cittam parisodheti

original: So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe
analyzed: saḥ ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetasaḥ upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe

original: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: vitakka vicārānam vūpasamāḥ ajjhattam sampasādanam pe dutiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Pītiyā ca virāgā … tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: pītiyā ca virāgā tatiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Sukhassa ca pahānā … catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: sukhassa ca pahānā catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Ye kho te, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhū sekkhā apattamānasā anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ patthayamānā viharanti tesu me ayaṁ evarūpī anusāsanī hoti.
analyzed: ye kho te brāhmaṇa bhikkhū sekkhāḥ a patta mānasāḥ anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamānāḥ viharanti tesu me ayam evarūpī anusāsanī hoti

original: Ye pana te bhikkhū arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā
analyzed: ye pana te bhikkhū arahantaḥ khīṇa āsavāḥ vusitavantaḥ kata karaṇīyāḥ ohita bhārāḥ anuppatta sadatthā

original: parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanā sammadaññāvimuttā tesaṁ ime dhammā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya
analyzed: parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanā sammad aññā vimuttā tesam ime dhammā diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārāya

original: ceva saṁvattanti, satisampajaññāya cā”ti.
analyzed: ca iva savattanti sati sampajaññāya ca ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte gaṇakamoggallānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “kiṁ nu kho bhoto gotamassa sāvakā bhotā gotamena evaṁ ovadīyamānā evaṁ anusāsīyamānā sabbe accantaṁ niṭṭhaṁ nibbānaṁ ārādhenti udāhu ekacce nārādhentī”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho bhoto gotamassa sāvakāḥ bhotā gotamena evam ovadīyamānāḥ evam anusāsīyamānā sabbe accantam niṭṭham nibbānam ārādhenti udāhu ekacce na ārādhenti iti

original: “Appekacce kho, brāhmaṇa, mama sāvakā mayā evaṁ ovadīyamānā evaṁ anusāsīyamānā accantaṁ niṭṭhaṁ nibbānaṁ ārādhenti, ekacce nārādhentī”ti.
analyzed: appa ekacce kho brāhmaṇa mama sāvakāḥ mayā evam ovadīyamānāḥ evam anusāsīyamānāḥ accantam niṭṭham nibbānam ārādhenti ekacce na ārādhenti iti

original: “Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yaṁ tiṭṭhateva nibbānaṁ, tiṭṭhati nibbānagāmī maggo, tiṭṭhati bhavaṁ gotamo samādapetā;
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho bho gotama hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ yat tiṭṭhatā iva nibbāna tiṭṭhati nibbāna gāmī maggo tiṭṭhati bhavam gotamaḥ samādapetā

original: atha ca pana bhoto gotamassa sāvakā bhotā gotamena evaṁ ovadīyamānā evaṁ anusāsīyamānā appekacce accantaṁ niṭṭhaṁ nibbānaṁ ārādhenti, ekacce nārādhentī”ti?
analyzed: atha ca pana bhotaḥ gotamassa sāvakāḥ bhotā gotamena evam ovadīyamānāḥ evam anusāsīyamānāḥ appekacce accantam niṭṭham nibbānam ārādhenti ekacce na ārādhenti iti

original: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, taṁyevettha paṭipucchissāmi. Yathā te khameyya tathā naṁ byākareyyāsi.
analyzed: tena hi brāhmaṇa tayā iva itthā paṭipucchissāmi yathā te khameyya tathā nam byākareyyāsi

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, brāhmaṇa,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi brāhmaṇa

original: kusalo tvaṁ rājagahagāmissa maggassā”ti?
analyzed: kusalaḥ tvam rājagaha gāmissa maggassa ati

original: “Evaṁ, bho, kusalo ahaṁ rājagahagāmissa maggassā”ti.
analyzed: eva bho kusalaḥ aham rājagaha gāmissa maggassa ati

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, brāhmaṇa,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi brāhmaṇa

original: idha puriso āgaccheyya rājagahaṁ gantukāmo.
analyzed: purisaḥ āgaccheyya rājagaham gantu kāmaḥ

original: So taṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: saḥ tam upasaṅkamitvā evam vadeyya

original: ‘icchāmahaṁ, bhante, rājagahaṁ gantuṁ;
analyzed: icchāmaha bhante rājagaham gantu

original: tassa me rājagahassa maggaṁ upadisā’ti.
analyzed: tassa me rājagahassa maggam upadisāti

original: Tamenaṁ tvaṁ evaṁ vadeyyāsi:
analyzed: tam enam tvam evam vadeyyā asi

original: ‘ehambho purisa, ayaṁ maggo rājagahaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: eham bho purisa ayam maggaḥ rājagaham gacchati

original: Tena muhuttaṁ gaccha, tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi amukaṁ nāma gāmaṁ, tena muhuttaṁ gaccha, tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi amukaṁ nāma nigamaṁ;
analyzed: tena muhuttam gaccha tena muhuttam gantvā dakkhissasi amukam nāma gāma tena muhuttam gaccha tena muhuttam gantvā dakkhissasi amukam nāma nigama

original: tena muhuttaṁ gaccha, tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi rājagahassa ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṁ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṁ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṁ pokkharaṇīrāmaṇeyyakan’ti.
analyzed: tena muhuttam gaccha tena muhuttam gantvā dakkhissasi rājagahassa ārāma rāmaṇeyyakam vana rāmaṇeyyakam bhūmi rāmaṇeyyakam pokkharaṇī rāmaṇeyyakanti

original: So tayā evaṁ ovadīyamāno evaṁ anusāsīyamāno ummaggaṁ gahetvā pacchāmukho gaccheyya.
analyzed: saḥ tayā evam ovadīyamānaḥ evam anusāsīyamānaḥ ummaggam gahetvā pacchāmukhaḥ gaccheyya

original: Atha dutiyo puriso āgaccheyya rājagahaṁ gantukāmo.
analyzed: atha dutiyaḥ purisaḥ āgaccheyya rājagaham gantu kāmo

original: So taṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: saḥ tam upasaṅkamitvā evam vadeyya

original: ‘icchāmahaṁ, bhante, rājagahaṁ gantuṁ;
analyzed: icchāmaha bhante rājagaham gantu

original: tassa me rājagahassa maggaṁ upadisā’ti.
analyzed: tassa me rājagahassa maggam upadisāti

original: Tamenaṁ tvaṁ evaṁ vadeyyāsi:
analyzed: tam enam tvam evam vadeyyā asi

original: ‘ehambho purisa, ayaṁ maggo rājagahaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: eham bho purisa ayam maggaḥ rājagaham gacchati

original: Tena muhuttaṁ gaccha, tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi amukaṁ nāma gāmaṁ;
analyzed: tena muhuttam gaccha tena muhuttam gantvā dakkhissasi amukam nāma gāma

original: tena muhuttaṁ gaccha, tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi amukaṁ nāma nigamaṁ;
analyzed: tena muhuttam gaccha tena muhuttam gantvā dakkhissasi amukam nāma nigama

original: tena muhuttaṁ gaccha, tena muhuttaṁ gantvā dakkhissasi rājagahassa ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṁ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṁ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṁ pokkharaṇīrāmaṇeyyakan’ti.
analyzed: tena muhuttam gaccha tena muhuttam gantvā dakkhissasi rājagahassa ārāma rāmaṇeyyakam vana rāmaṇeyyakam bhūmi rāmaṇeyyakam pokkharaṇī rāmaṇeyyakanti

original: So tayā evaṁ ovadīyamāno evaṁ anusāsīyamāno sotthinā rājagahaṁ gaccheyya.
analyzed: saḥ tayā evam ovadīyamānaḥ evam anusāsīyamānaḥ sotthinā rājagaham gaccheyya

original: Ko nu kho, brāhmaṇa, hetu ko paccayo yaṁ tiṭṭhateva rājagahaṁ, tiṭṭhati rājagahagāmī maggo, tiṭṭhasi tvaṁ samādapetā;
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho brāhmaṇa hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ yam tiṭṭhatā iva rājagaha tiṭṭhati rājagaha gāmī maggo tiṭṭhasi tvam samādapetā

original: atha ca pana tayā evaṁ ovadīyamāno evaṁ anusāsīyamāno eko puriso ummaggaṁ gahetvā pacchāmukho gaccheyya, eko sotthinā rājagahaṁ gaccheyyā”ti?
analyzed: atha ca pana tayā evam ovadīyamānaḥ evam anusāsīyamānaḥ ekaḥ purisaḥ ummaggam gahetvā pacchāmukhaḥ gaccheyya ekaḥ sotthinā rājagaham gaccheyya ati

original: “Ettha kyāhaṁ, bho gotama, karomi?
analyzed: ettha kyā āha bho gotama karomi

original: Maggakkhāyīhaṁ, bho gotamā”ti.
analyzed: magga khāyī iha bho gotama ati

original: “Evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, tiṭṭhateva nibbānaṁ, tiṭṭhati nibbānagāmī maggo, tiṭṭhāmahaṁ samādapetā;
analyzed: evam eva kho brāhmaṇa tiṭṭhatā iva nibbāna tiṭṭhati nibbāna gāmī maggaḥ tiṭṭhām aham samādapetā

original: atha ca pana mama sāvakā mayā evaṁ ovadīyamānā evaṁ anusāsīyamānā appekacce accantaṁ niṭṭhaṁ nibbānaṁ ārādhenti, ekacce nārādhenti.
analyzed: atha ca pana mama sāvakāḥ mayā evam ovadīyamānāḥ evam anusāsīyamānāḥ appekacce accantam niṭṭham nibbānam ārādhenti ekacce na ārādhenti

original: Ettha kyāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, karomi?
analyzed: ettha kyā āha brāhmaṇa karomi

original: Maggakkhāyīhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, tathāgato”ti.
analyzed: magga khāyī iha brāhmaṇa tathāgataḥ ti

original: Evaṁ vutte, gaṇakamoggallāno brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte gaṇakamoggallānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “yeme, bho gotama, puggalā assaddhā jīvikatthā na saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā
analyzed: ye me bho gotama puggalāḥ assaddhāḥ jīvikatthāḥ na saddhāḥ agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitā

original: saṭhā māyāvino ketabino uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā indriyesu aguttadvārā
analyzed: saṭhāḥ māyāvino ketabinaḥ uddhatāḥ unnaḷāḥ capalāḥ mukharāḥ vikiṇṇa vācāḥ indriyesu a gutta dvārāḥ

original: bhojane amattaññuno jāgariyaṁ ananuyuttā sāmaññe anapekkhavanto sikkhāya na tibbagāravā
analyzed: bhojane amattaññunaḥ jāgariyam an anuyuttā sāmaññe an apekkhavantaḥ sikkhāya na tibba gāravā

original: bāhulikā sāthalikā okkamane pubbaṅgamā paviveke nikkhittadhurā kusītā hīnavīriyā
analyzed: bāhulikā sāthalikā okkamane pubbaṅgamā paviveke nikkhitta dhurā kusītā hīna vīriyā

original: muṭṭhassatino asampajānā asamāhitā vibbhantacittā duppaññā eḷamūgā, na tehi bhavaṁ
analyzed: muṭṭha ssatinaḥ asampajānāḥ asamāhitāḥ vibbhanta cittāḥ duppaññāḥ eḷamūgāḥ na tehi bhava

original: gotamo saddhiṁ saṁvasati.
analyzed: gotamaḥ saddhim savasati

original: Ye pana te kulaputtā saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitā asaṭhā amāyāvino aketabino
analyzed: ye pana te kula puttā saddhāḥ agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitāḥ a saṭhāḥ a māyāvinaḥ a ketabinaḥ

original: anuddhatā anunnaḷā acapalā amukharā avikiṇṇavācā indriyesu guttadvārā bhojane mattaññuno
analyzed: an uddhatāḥ an unnaḷāḥ a capalāḥ a mukharāḥ a vikiṇṇa vācāḥ indriyesu gutta dvārāḥ bhojane mattaññunaḥ

original: jāgariyaṁ anuyuttā sāmaññe apekkhavanto sikkhāya tibbagāravā nabāhulikā nasāthalikā
analyzed: jāgariyam anuyuttā sāmaññe apekkhavantaḥ sikkhāya tibba gāravā na bāhulikāḥ na sāthalikā

original: okkamane nikkhittadhurā paviveke pubbaṅgamā āraddhavīriyā pahitattā upaṭṭhitassatino
analyzed: okkamane nikkhitta dhurā paviveke pubbaṅgamāḥ āraddha vīriyāḥ pahita ttāḥ upaṭṭhita ssatino

original: sampajānā samāhitā ekaggacittā paññavanto aneḷamūgā, tehi bhavaṁ gotamo saddhiṁ saṁvasati.
analyzed: sampajānā samāhitāḥ ekagga cittāḥ paññavantaḥ an eḷamūgāḥ tehi bhavam gotamaḥ saddhim savasati

original: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, ye keci mūlagandhā, kālānusāri tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati;
analyzed: seyyathā api bho gotama ye keci mūla gandhā kālānusāri tesam aggam akkhāyati

original: ye keci sāragandhā, lohitacandanaṁ tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati;
analyzed: ye keci sāra gandhāḥ lohita candanam tesam aggam akkhāyati

original: ye keci pupphagandhā, vassikaṁ tesaṁ aggamakkhāyati;
analyzed: ye keci puppha gandhāḥ vassikam tesam aggam akkhāyati

original: evameva bhoto gotamassa ovādo paramajjadhammesu.
analyzed: evam eva bhoto gotamassa ovādaḥ paramajja dhammesu

original: Abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama.
analyzed: abhikkanta bho gotama abhikkanta bho gotama

original: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa
analyzed: seyyathā api bho gotama nikkujjitam vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannam vā vivareyya mūḷhassa

original: vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
analyzed: vā maggam ācikkheyya andhakāre vā tela pajjotam dhāreyya cakkhumantaḥ rūpāni dakkhanti iti

original: evamevaṁ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
analyzed: evam evam bhotā gotamena aneka pariyāyena dhammo pakāsito

original: Esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
analyzed: esā aham bhavantam gotamam saraṇam gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhu saṅghañca

original: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhavam gotamaḥ dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetam saraṇam gatanti

original: Gaṇakamoggallānasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ sattamaṁ.
analyzed: gaṇakamoggallāna suttam niṭṭhitam sattama
